description: This file defines the 'PermissionsClient' class, a wrapper around gRPC stubs for interacting with permission-related services in OttServices. It provides methods to enumerate, get, grant, set, revoke, delete permissions, and other related operations, facilitating communication with the remote permission service.

classes.name: PermissionsClient
classes.description: A client class for communicating with the OttServices permission gRPC service, providing APIs for permission management operations.

methods.name: PermissionsClient
methods.description: Constructs a PermissionsClient targeting a remote gRPC endpoint, with options for TLS or custom credentials.

methods.name: ~PermissionsClient
methods.description: Destructor for PermissionsClient, cleans up resources.

methods.name: EnumeratePermissions
methods.description: Calls the remote EnumeratePermissions RPC to list permissions for a specified app.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Retrieves the permissions object for an app via the Get RPC.

methods.name: Grant
methods.description: Grants specified permissions and bundles to an app, invoking the Grant RPC.

methods.name: Set
methods.description: Sets/replaces permission data for an app with full vectors via the Set RPC.

methods.name: Revoke
methods.description: Revokes specified permissions and bundles from an app through the Revoke RPC.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes an app’s permission record via the Delete RPC.

methods.name: Authorize
methods.description: Authorizes a session token against a set of permission filters via the Authorize RPC.

methods.name: GetAllForApp
methods.description: Retrieves all permission entries for a specific app.

methods.name: GetAllAppKeys
methods.description: Returns all app keys known to the permission service.

methods.name: GetThorToken
methods.description: Obtains a Thor token for an app, given content provider, session IDs, mode, etc.

methods.name: GetRegisteredPermissions
methods.description: Fetches the catalog of registered permissions.

methods.name: RegisterPermissions
methods.description: Registers new permissions or replaces existing ones in the catalog.

methods.name: DeleteRegisteredPermission
methods.description: Deletes a specific permission entry from the catalog.

methods.name: Endpoint
methods.description: Returns the endpoint string used by the client.

methods.name: CreateChannel
methods.description: Creates a gRPC channel with TLS or insecure configuration based on parameters.

methods.name: CreateChannel (overload)
methods.description: Creates a gRPC channel with supplied custom credentials.
